mapper.sql: `id` AS id, `symbol` AS symbol, `currency_id1` AS currencyId1, `currency_id2` AS currencyId2, `price_decimal_digits` AS priceDecimalDigits, `count_decimal_digits` AS countDecimalDigits, `min_price` AS minPrice, `min_count` AS minCount, `min_amount` AS minAmount, `max_price` AS maxPrice, `max_count` AS maxCount, `max_amount` AS maxAmount, `status` AS status, `sort` AS sort, `create_time` AS createTime, `update_time` AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.symbol,t.currency_id1 AS currencyId1,c1.`name` AS currencyName,t.currency_id2 AS currencyId2,c2.`name` AS legalCurrencyName, t.price_decimal_digits AS priceDecimalDigits,t.count_decimal_digits AS countDecimalDigits,t.min_price AS minPrice,t.min_count AS minCount, t.min_amount AS minAmount,t.max_price AS maxPrice,t.max_count AS maxCount,t.max_amount AS maxAmount FROM t_currency_trade t INNER JOIN t_currency c1 ON t.currency_id1 = c1.id INNER JOIN t_currency c2 ON t.currency_id2 = c2.id WHERE t.`status` = 1 ORDER BY t.sort LIMIT 1

SELECT t.id,t.symbol,t.currency_id1 AS currencyId1,c1.`name` AS currencyName,t.currency_id2 AS currencyId2,c2.`name` AS legalCurrencyName, t.price_decimal_digits AS priceDecimalDigits,t.count_decimal_digits AS countDecimalDigits,t.min_price AS minPrice,t.min_count AS minCount, t.min_amount AS minAmount,t.max_price AS maxPrice,t.max_count AS maxCount,t.max_amount AS maxAmount FROM t_currency_trade t INNER JOIN t_currency c1 ON t.currency_id1 = c1.id INNER JOIN t_currency c2 ON t.currency_id2 = c2.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
